item.title: how is GPTChat on medical questions?
item.description:
Valentin Li√©vin on Twitter

‚ÄúCan large language models reason about medical questions? We investigated whether GPT-3.5 could answer and reason about challenging medical questions (e.g., USMLE) using Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting. (1/6) TL;DR: Yes, close to the human level. Paper: https://t.co/xcjAP4c6KX‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/valentinlievin/status/1605965336179658766

Carol for Another Christmas (1964) - Rod Serling‚Äôs retelling of A Christmas Carol
Have a Cold War liberal Christmas!
item.description:
Here we are in A Christmas Carol season. Regular readers know I‚Äôm partial to the Alastair Sim version ‚Äî the hammy Victorianism of it suits me (and, I think, Dickens) right down to the ground. But some of the other versions have their charms and sidelights to throw on that grand moral fable of recalcitrance and redemption. A friend tipped me to the relatively obscure 1964 Rod Serling version‚Ä¶

URL: https://edroso.substack.com/p/have-a-cold-war-liberal-christmas?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
